title: The REAL Madison and Charles Montgomery Connection
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: What are your thoughts on Madison being back? Thumbs up meaning happy, thumbs down meaning it sucks balls.
But in Coven they said the witch bloodline can skip generations.
I hate (fiction or  not) when men are called warlocks.... They're all witches damnit. Regardless of what Ryan says.

The only thing I can think is that yes, these two ARE connected, but are possibly from different branches of the same family tree. Charles Montgomery moved to Los Angeles and built the house for his wife then sent for her. This is the only familial history we have on the Montgomeries, meaning if Charles has siblings in his hometown, this could be where Madison's line begins. But also it can skip a generation skipping charles

The most important key I think everyone is missing is actually given in Roanoke. The witch of the wood who Ryan Confirmed was the first supreme. Also if it’s a “mashup” season all the connection to both murder house and coven will most likely play a big role no matter how small.
